article_title: How CFOs Are Tackling the Affordable Care Act
article_text:
Should Emerging Markets Be Scared of the Fed?

38:54 - Amer Bisat, head of BlackRock's Emerging Markets Crossover team, discusses the impact of Fed policy on emerging markets with Bloomberg's Oliver Renick, Scarlet Fu and Alix Steel on "What'd You Miss?" (Source: Bloomberg)

article_metadata.description: Sept. 20 (Bloomberg) –- The CFO Alliance Co-Founder and CEO Nick Araco discusses the impact from a cost perspective of  health care reform.  He speaks with Erik Schatzker and Stephanie Ruhle on Bloomberg Television’s “Market Makers.” (Source: Bloomberg)
